link.title: COVID- 19 Public Guidance Regarding School Meals

link.script: window.setTimeout(function () { document.title = "COVID- 19 Public Guidance Regarding School Meals - Cumberland County School District"; }, 500);

div.h1: COVID- 19 Public Guidance Regarding School Meals

img.alt: Visit CCSchools Facebook for more information

p.a: See Facebook Page for more information:

td.p: Revised due to "stay at Home" Mandate

tr.td: COVID- 19 Public Guidance Regarding School Meals
Ensuring children continue to receive nutritional services is of paramount importance during unexpected closures as many children rely on these school-based services for meals.

td.span: are eligible for free meals during school closures due to COVID-19!

tr.td: Meals MAY be picked up without children present
Please see the location and schedule below to find a meal site near you during school closures.
Until further notice, TO LIMIT EXPOSURE MEALS WILL BE GIVEN OUT ONLY ON MONDAYS AND THURSDAYS
3 days of meals will be given on Monday AND 4 days of meals will be given on Thursday
Fairfield Glade (Old church parking lot beside First National Bank)
Drive Up Grab and Go Sites:
11:00AM – 12:00PM (or until the last person is served)
11:00AM – 12:00PM (or until the last person is served)
11:00AM – 12:00PM (or until the last person is served)
11:00AM – 12:00PM (or until the last person is served)
11:00AM – 12:00PM (or until the last person is served)
11:00AM – 12:00PM (or until the last person is served)
11:00AM – 12:00PM (or until the last person is served)
11:00AM – 12:00PM (or until the last person is served)
Pine View Elementary (with assistance from Mt. Vernal Church)
If you have any questions please reach out to:
Kathy Hamby, School Nutrition District Supervisor

div.p:
Revisado debido al mandato de "quedarse en casa"
A partir del lunes 6 de abril de 2020
Programa de nutrición escolar del condado de Cumberland
COVID- 19 Orientación pública sobre las comidas escolares
Asegurar que los niños continúen recibiendo servicios nutricionales es de suma importancia durante los cierres inesperados, ya que muchos niños dependen de estos servicios escolares para las comidas.
¡Todos los niños de 18 años y menores son elegibles para comidas gratis durante el cierre de la escuela debido a COVID-19!
Las comidas PUEDEN ser recogidas sin niños presentes
Vea la ubicación y el horario a continuación para encontrar un sitio de comidas cerca de usted durante el cierre de la escuela.
Hasta nuevo aviso, PARA LIMITAR LAS COMIDAS DE EXPOSICIÓN SE REPARTIRÁN SOLO LOS LUNES Y JUEVES
Se darán 3 días de comidas el lunes Y 4 días de comidas el jueves
